Protein Names: Geranylgeranyl pyrophosphate synthase (GGPP synthase) (GGPPSase) (EC 2.5.1.-) ((2E,6E)-farnesyl diphosphate synthase) (Dimethylallyltranstransferase) (EC 2.5.1.1) (Farnesyl diphosphate synthase) (Farnesyltranstransferase) (EC 2.5.1.29) (Geranylgeranyl diphosphate synthase) (Geranyltranstransferase) (EC 2.5.1.10)
